name: MT FilesStore Bot
description: A Telegram Files Store Bot in Pyrogram by @MRK_YT

API_ID.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org or @MT_MyTelegramOrg_Bot

API_HASH.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org or @MT_MyTelegramOrg_Bot

MT_BOT_USERNAME.description: Your Bot Username which you sent to @BotFather (Without [@])

DB_CHANNEL.description: The Channel ID which will be used as Database. Example: -100123456789

DATABASE_URL.description: MongoDB Database URI for Saving UserID for Broadcast.

MT_UPDATES_CHANNEL.description: ID of a Channel which you want to do Force Sub to use the bot. Example: -100123456789

MT_LOG_CHANNEL.description: Logs Channel ID for some Tracking XD. Example: -100123456789

BROADCAST_AS_COPY.description: Broadcast with Forward Tag or as Copy(Without Forward Tag). Value should be True/False !!

MO_TECH_YT.description: If True all messages will be forwarder As Copy. If False all messages will be forwarder with Forward Tag. Value should be True/False !!
